executable.title: Affine registration for BWH CPFI
executable.description: Registers two images together using an affine transform and mutual information. Modified for BWH CPFI project
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

string-enumeration.name: RunningMode_Grid
string-enumeration.description: Running Mode: Where the module shall be executed? On your local machine or on a grid?
string-enumeration.label: Running Mode

directory.name: InputDirectory_Grid
directory.label: Grid input directory
directory.description: Directory where the input data are. Necessary if dealing with relative input paths.

directory.name: OutputDirectory_Grid
directory.label: Grid output directory
directory.description: Directory where the output data are. Necessary if dealing with relative output paths.

directory.name: WorkingDirectory_Grid
directory.label: Grid working directory
directory.description: Directory where the condor scripts are written.

string-enumeration.name: TransferFile_Grid
string-enumeration.description: Type of files that shall be transfered by the grid
string-enumeration.label: Transfer File

integer.name: FixedImageSmoothingFactor
integer.description: Amount of smoothing applied to fixed image prior to registration. Default is 0 (none). Range is 0-5 (unitless). Consider smoothing the input data if there is considerable amounts of noise or the noise pattern in the fixed and moving images is very different.
integer.label: Smoothing level for fixed image

integer.name: MovingImageSmoothingFactor
integer.description: Amount of smoothing applied to moving image prior to registration. Default is 0 (none). Range is 0-5 (unitless). Consider smoothing the input data if there is considerable amounts of noise or the noise pattern in the fixed and moving images is very different.
integer.label: Smoothing level for moving image

integer.name: HistogramBins
integer.description: Number of histogram bins to use for Mattes Mutual Information. Reduce the number of bins if a registration fails. If the number of bins is too large, the estimated PDFs will be a field of impulses and will inhibit reliable registration estimation.
integer.label: Histogram Bins

integer.name: SpatialSamples
integer.description: Number of spatial samples to use in estimating Mattes Mutual Information. Larger values yield more accurate PDFs and improved registration quality.
integer.label: Spatial Samples

double.name: TranslationScale
double.description: Relative scale of translations to rotations, i.e. a value of 100 means 10mm = 1 degree. (Actual scale used is 1/(TranslationScale^2)). This parameter is used to "weight" or "standardized" the transform parameters and their effect on the registration objective function.
double.label: Translation scaling

transform.name: InitialTransform
transform.description: Initial transform for aligning the fixed and moving image. Maps positions in the fixed coordinate frame to positions in the moving coordinate frame. Optional.
transform.label: Initial transform

directory.name: fixedImageFileName_Directory
directory.label: Fixed Image
directory.description: Fixed image to which to register

directory.name: outputTransform_Directory
directory.description: Transform calculated that aligns the fixed and moving image. Maps positions in the fixed coordinate frame to the moving coordinate frame. Optional (specify an output transform or an output volume or both).
directory.label: Output transform

directory.name: resampledImageFileName_Directory
directory.label: Output Volume
directory.description: Resampled moving image to the fixed image coordinate frame. Optional (specify an output transform or an output volume or both).
